suncertify.gui

Interface RecordsPanel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchPanel

    public interface RecordsPanel
    This interface provides methods that every records panel component in the main gui must implement.
    Version:
    Feb 12, 2013.
    Author:
    Moses L. Jilugu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(java.lang.Object object)
      Method to display object on the records panel
      void refresh()
      Method to refresh current displayed data with updated data from data model.
      void registerController(Controller controller)
      Method to register event handler class for events in the records panel.
      void registerModel(Model model)
      Method to register data model.
